title: 10 ways to protect seniors from email scams
full_text: 10 ways to protect seniors from email scams. Email scams are targeting seniors at alarming rates, threatening life savings with a single click. Discover how families can add digital guardrails today.. Email scams have become one of the fastest ways scammers steal money from older adults. A single click can expose bank accounts, personal data and retirement savings built over a lifetime. That growi… [+14046 chars]
